bibl.title: Setting the Record Straight. Alternative Documents of a Protest in the Roman Army of Egypt.
bibl.note: Compares P. Fouad 21 and P. Yale Inv. 1528 (= S.B. V, 8247), two "original" versions of the same episode, one from either side of a dispute. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 76 (2007) No. 11324.
JUDGE Edwin, Setting the Record Straight. Alternative Documents of a Protest in the Roman Army of Egypt.
